data.title: Religion in the House by state and by faith
data.meta_description: Newhouse News Service (n: new member) Alabama (5-2 Republican) 1: Jo Bonner (R) Episcopalian 2: Terry Everett (R) Baptist 3: Mike D. Rogers (R) Baptist 4: Robert Aderholt (R) Congregationalist-Baptist 5: Bud Cramer (D) Methodist 6: Spencer Bachus (R) Baptist...
